title: Service Fabric CLI Repository Reference
body: Service Fabric CLI repository (Azure/service-fabric-cli) provides sfctl command-line tools for Service Fabric cluster management. Contains commands for application deployment, cluster monitoring, node management, and service scaling. Includes Python-based tools, REST API wrappers, and automation scripts for Service Fabric operations.
